com.psddev.dari.util
Class PeriodicValue<T>

java.lang.Object
  com.psddev.dari.util.PeriodicValue<T>

public abstract class PeriodicValue<T>
extends Object

Holds a value that will periodically update itself.

Field Summary
static double DEFAULT_INITIAL_DELAY
           
static double DEFAULT_INTERVAL
           
 
Constructor Summary
PeriodicValue()
          Creates an instance that will update every DEFAULT_INTERVAL seconds.
PeriodicValue(double interval)
          Creates an instance that will update every given interval (in seconds).
PeriodicValue(double initialDelay, double interval)
          Creates an instance that will update every given interval after the given initialDelay (in seconds).
 
Method Summary
 T get()
          Returns the value.
 Task getTask()
          Returns the task used to update the value.
 Date getUpdateDate()
          Returns the last time that this value was updated.
 void refresh()
          Refreshes the value immediately.
protected abstract  T update()
          Returns a value that will replace the existing value.

clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
